jobDescription: Sr. Data Analyst - 23277 Gracenote - USA Los Angeles, California We are presently looking for a Senior Data Analyst to work with our LA-based team on our portfolio of entertainment data services. (NYSE: NLSN) is a global performance management company that provides a comprehensive understanding of what consumers Watch and Buy. Nielsen’s Watch segment provides media and advertising clients with Total Audience measurement services across all devices where content — video, audio, and text — is consumed.
